Class EnemyBrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ie.gmit.sw.ai.characters.EnemyBrain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class EnemyBrain
extends java.lang.Thread
    This is where the enemies are created, killed and managed.

    Ronan
